channel.title: Abouts on PraxisLIVE Unofficial Guide
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on PraxisLIVE Unofficial Guide

item.title: About
item.description: This is an unofficial guide for PraxisLIVE that will help newcomers to manage the software basics. In the future custom nodes that will improve the software capabilities will be uploaded here. Here are the references to the official PraxisLIVE material. PraxisLIVE: https://www.praxislive.org/ PraxisLIVE Documentation: https://docs.praxislive.org/ PraxisLIVE GitHub: https://github.com/praxis-live Processing: https://processing.org/ This project is developped by Giacomo Sabatini and professor Davide Riboli at the Urbino Accademy of Fine Arts. All the contents are under the MIT License.
